title: Interpretation of seeing a spider in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the article below, we present to you Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a spider in a dream. Seeing a spider in a dream is one of the disturbing dreams that frighten those who see it in the dream. Spiders are among the insects found in homes and abandoned places, as they are abundant in unclean places. Seeing this insect in a dream carries many connotations and meanings, which we will explain to you in the next encyclopedia article through the interpretation of a dream about a spider in a dream. By Ibn Sirin for an unmarried and married girl and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a spider in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees a spider in his dream has a cunning and malicious friend who is trying to harm him and set a trap for him that he wants to put him in. Seeing a spider in a dream indicates the presence of a hated woman. In the dreamer's life. If the dreamer sees a spider web in his dream, this is a sign of his marriage to a woman with a bad reputation among people. This vision can sometimes indicate that the person with knowledge is a very intelligent person and excels in his field of work. If a man sees in a dream If a spider spins its webs on the walls of the bedroom, this is a sign that this person carries many negative thoughts that may lead him to death. A dream about spinning spider webs indicates that the dreamer is a corrupt person who harms others. If a woman sees a spider in her bed, this is a sign that she She commits sins and misdeeds and follows her desires. If the dreamer saw that he was demolishing a spider’s house in his dream, this is a good vision that indicates his good conditions with God Almighty. If the sleeper sees a spider coming out of his mouth, this indicates that he is harming others with his tongue. Interpretation of seeing a spider in a dream For a single woman: If a single girl dreams of a white spider, this is a sign that the man who will enter her life is a man of high status. Seeing a spider coming out of an unmarried girl’s clothes in a dream means that there is a woman in her life who is trying to harm her and damage her reputation. If an unmarried girl sees A yellow spider in her dream, this is a sign that she will suffer from a major health problem. A single girl’s dream of a spider may indicate the emergence of problems and sorrows in her life. Interpretation of seeing a spider in a dream for a married woman: If you see a white spider in a married woman’s dream, this indicates that her supporter is a distinguished man And intelligent. If a married woman dreams of a black spider, this is a sign that there are people in her life who hate her and are trying to harm and harm her and that this person is one of her close friends or family. Interpretation of seeing a spider in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a spider in a pregnant woman’s dream shows her fear and anxiety about her birth Seeing a spider in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she is very anxious and anxious about the future. Interpretation of seeing a spider in a dream for a man: A dream about a spider in a man’s dream indicates the presence of a woman with bad morals and a bad reputation in his life and that this woman is trying to harm the dreamer. And if the sleeper sees it in his dream Cobwebs in his house, this is a sign that there is a woman in his house who is backward in her religion and is committing sins and sins.

title: Seeing yourself buying vegetables in a dream

preview.html: This vision carries many clues, according to the plant vision, and the state of opinion via the gptafser.com/ website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for one girl When she sees the vegetable market, it shows the money she will earn. When a Virgo buys green lettuce, this symbolizes the end of problems And that God will make her happy, and it may be the repayment of a debt. Green pepper in a dream refers to unmarried women, which indicates success. And eating pepper in a dream symbolizes that you will achieve what you want. Green lettuce is considered a sign of recovery from illness. Green lettuce in a girl’s dream Unmarried is a sign that she has overcome some difficulties and turmoil, and God knows best. She can earn money and the financial situation will improve, God willing. Seeing the vegetable market may be a sign of some of her stingy qualities. This dream forces her to stop these qualities, and if the opposite is the case, then this dream indicates On the livelihood that came to her. Fresh vegetables in the market for unmarried women in a dream, indicates that she has morals and a good reputation among the people. When an unmarried woman sees herself in the market, and it is full of fresh vegetables, this is a sign that the marriage will be completed without problems. The dream With withered vegetables and scarcity in the market indicates that the engagement will not be completed, and God knows best. He saw him entering the market full of people, and the girl was comfortable among them. This indicates that in her life she will meet people who will bring her goodness, and God knows best. While walking in the market is uncomfortable and cramped because there are a lot of People. This indicates that this girl is under severe pressure, causing her psychological state to deteriorate. But if she hears bold words from a group of young men in a dream through the market. This symbolizes that her friend or relatives will hurt her with words. Searching for specific vegetables in the market In a dream, finding it after hardship indicates achieving what one desires after hardship and exhaustion. If a virgin girl buys vegetables in a dream, this is considered good news for her that she will achieve what she wants. But if she sees that the market is full of many different vegetables, it is good for her to marry someone. A wealthy man and lives a luxurious life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about buying vegetables for a divorced woman. Interpretation of seeing a vegetable market in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman buys vegetables without thinking or considering whether they are spoiled or fresh. This shows her that she is a woman in a hurry and needs to be careful. In her decisions. But when she enters a small market and buys vegetables from it, her interest in religion and her interest in increasing her culture appear. To see cabbage in her dream, it may be a warning to her that she will face a scam from a fraudster. As for him to see that he is buying turnips, this is not good because it conveys the deterioration of the financial situation to the person. Poverty, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The vegetable market for a married woman in her dream symbolizes her feeling of happiness in married life. As for seeing tomatoes in the market and buying them, it may be a symbol of her obtaining a promotion in her job. This dream may make her sacrifice for the sake of

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about chasing dogs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about being chased by dogs in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about hunting dogs in a dream indicates signs that may seem frightening to some, but the vision has a positive meaning in the event that the dreamer escapes from the dogs and is able to protect himself from them, and many other indicators are mentioned in the following paragraphs so that every dreamer who knows the meaning has Seeing follow the interpretations of jurists in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about hunting dogs: If the dogs that chased the dreamer were so fast that they caught him and he fell prey to them in the dream, then he is harmed by his strong opponents, and his defeat in front of them will make him feel weak and helpless. The dogs that chase the absolute dreamer in her sleep are People who lack morals and want to commit immorality with them, and if you can hide from them, you will escape from their machinations and be protected from sins and misdeeds. If the dreamer sees many black puppies running after him, then he is exposed to serious harm from the jinn and devils, knowing that the puppies were collecting puppies That is, a small dog. If a man sees a dog running after him and chasing him, then if he is married, this is his domineering wife who complains and cries a lot, but if he is single, then she is a girl with bad morals surrounding him. Being awake and wanting to communicate with him. The familiar person who saves the dreamer from the dogs that chased him in the dream is a kind and brave person who will not leave the dreamer alone in distress or crisis, but will stand by him until he comes out of it safely. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about hunting dogs by Ibn Sirin. If the dogs that chased the dreamer in the dream were friendly and peaceful, then this money is equal to the number of dogs that appeared in the dream. Ibn Sirin reassures the dreamers who saw this vision and tells them that dogs are enemies, but they do not have Tricks or strength, they are weak and easy to defeat. If the dreamer encounters the dog that is chasing him and slaughters it and eats its meat, then he is a strong person and regains his right from his opponents who previously caught him. If the dreamer sees a dog chasing him wherever he goes, this indicates that he is being watched by a foolish and evil person. In his wake. The large number of dogs that chase the dreamer in a dream are his enemies in reality, and the dream also means the amount of pain that the dreamer is fighting in his life, knowing that the source of this pain is the many pressures, such as financial pressures. And the large number of creditors who chase him while he is awake and want their money from him, and perhaps the pressures that fill his life are a problem with his family and friends. Interpretation of dreams about dogs chasing one woman: When the dreamer sees violent dogs chasing her, and she lacks the strength to fight them, and she sees a police dog confronting them and making them flee in fear, this indicates The support and strength she enjoys from someone she wants happy in her life and away from harm. If the dogs have rabies and are chasing the dreamer vigorously in the dream, then they are people with malicious souls and they want her to be tired in her life, and if she runs away from them, then she is a smart girl and cannot even escape from them. If they make plans and designs for it. The message that the dreamer must understand well from the vision is protection from...

title: The meaning of braiding hair in a dream, dreaming of braiding hair in a dream

preview.html: The dream of braiding human hair and braiding one’s hair is for a single woman, married, pregnant, divorced or unmarried, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of braiding hair in a dream: The dream of braiding hair is beneficial for women and men who are accustomed to it. As for the rest of the people, the complexity of his affairs and the large number of debts that he borrows appear, and this may indicate confusion. Placing hair in a dream means collecting money and uniting the crops, and if he frees it and removes lice from his head, it means that corrupt people will be chased from his land. Braids are evidence of a person’s debts. Whoever sees braids of hair In a dream, it is a debt he owes, even if he does not owe a debt, and God knows best. Interpretation of braiding hair in a dream Braiding hair in a dream indicates the confusion and confusion that the dreamer faces in reality and negatively affects his comfort and stability. Braiding hair in a dream symbolizes his many debts and the difficulty of paying them. It can be The dream of braiding hair symbolizes the dreamer’s quest to collect and accumulate money. The hair braid in the dream can indicate the farmer’s performance and the collection of his crops. Good hair and nails in a dream. The Lord shows us the work and arrangement of the hair, and perhaps the hair shows me that I am in good condition if it is good in the dream. And bad if it is bad, and bad hair. In a dream, it indicates a terrifying disease, and if a woman’s hair grows for three centuries, she divorces her husband three times. Interpretation of hair braiding in one dream: Braiding a woman’s hair or the hair of others in a dream indicates the ease with which she will achieve her goals and most of her dreams come true. When an unmarried woman braids her hair in In a dream, this is a positive sign that she is connected to a person with high morals and good characteristics. Interpretation of hair braiding in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman braids her hair in a dream, this symbolizes that she will benefit from a very important opportunity for her. Interpretation of hair braiding in a dream for a pregnant woman. Hair braiding in a dream A pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a male child. Interpretation of long hair in dreams: For someone who does not deserve it, it is evidence of worries, suffering, and debts, because he needs service, repair, and long hair in a dream. Hair in a dream is good, as God Almighty says, “He creates what He wills,” and it was said that it is hair. Palmite in a dream (and what burlap means is hair on the shoulders) and its length and color on its back resembles a snake when it emerges from its hole in search of comfort, as is its curling and dyeing. The focus was latent. Anyone who dreams that he has a long skull may have tried or fallen on a snake. Interpretation of body hair in a dream. If a human’s hair in a dream becomes like the hair of other animals, this indicates fatigue and exhaustion, and if he is poor, he may become wealthy. Interpretation of eyebrow hair In a dream, the tail of the eye and the hair of the forearms, chest, and legs are male adornment, strength, protection, clothing, a jacket, and permanent money. Interpretation of armpit hair in a dream Seeing useless hair, such as the armpit and pubic hair, is an increase in worry and anxiety, and a departure from the Sunnah. Interpretation of ear hair in a dream Words or less to hear, interpretation of hair A nose in a dream indicates news that is characterized by discontent or something hidden

Palmite in a dream (and what burlap means is hair on the shoulders) and its length and color on its back resembles a snake when it emerges from its hole in search of comfort, as is its curling and dyeing. The focus was latent. Anyone who dreams that he has a long skull may have tried or fallen on a snake. Interpretation of body hair in a dream. If a human’s hair in a dream becomes like the hair of other animals, this indicates fatigue and exhaustion, and if he is poor, he may become wealthy. Interpretation of eyebrow hair In a dream, the tail of the eye and the hair of the forearms, chest, and legs are male adornment, strength, protection, clothing, a jacket, and permanent money. Interpretation of armpit hair in a dream Seeing useless hair, such as the armpit and pubic hair, is an increase in worry and anxiety, and a departure from the Sunnah. Interpretation of ear hair in a dream Words or less to hear, interpretation of hair A nose in a dream indicates news that is characterized by discontent or something hidden

title: Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of a friend

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a friend’s betrayalInterpretation of a dream about a friend’s betrayal in a dream. In many dreams, the sleeper wakes up from an anxious dream because he saw or dreamed of what he saw, and he was afraid of it and was afraid of it and always wanted to know the meaning of this dream. We will learn through this article to see the interpretation of a dream about a friend’s betrayal in a way Different.Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of a friend in a dream. Betrayal of a friend in a dream could be the result of the dreamer’s lack of trust in this friend. Betrayal of a friend in a dream indicates great benefits from that friend. Betrayal in a dream, according to Imam Al-Sadiq, could be a sign of the many pressures and problems that The dreamer must confront her. Interpretation of a dream about a girl’s betrayal in a dream. Betrayal in a dream of a single engaged girl is a sign of the end of the engagement and her separation from her current fiancé. Seeing betrayal in a single girl’s dream means that she achieved the dreams she was looking for without putting in much effort. If the woman is in Dreaming of a female student this year, cheating with her in a dream indicates her academic excellence this year and achieving the highest grades. Interpretation of a dream about someone cheating on someone in a dreamBetrayal of a person in a dream, which interpretation scholars consider signs that the visionary has established a business with this person and has achieved many Benefits. Betrayal by someone known to the dreamer is one of the signs that the dreamer stands by that person to get out of a difficult crisis or pressure going through this period. Interpretation of a dream about cheating in a dream: In general, deception in a dream. Scientists involved in dream interpretation see it as a sign of the dreamer falling into Poverty and suffering for a certain period of time. Cheating in a dream can symbolize many obstacles and crises that the dreamer will face. Cheating in dreams means distinguishing the dreamer’s bad behavior from one person to another. Interpretation of a dream of betrayal of a loved one in a dream Betrayal of a lover in a dream shows the strength of the relationship that exists between the dreamer And the lover in reality. The betrayal of an unmarried girl by a lover is a sign of good news that this lover will marry her beloved. Al-Nabulsi believes that the betrayal of one of his family members in a dream is one of the signs of that beloved person who is trying to please the dreamer in every way. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal with a knife in a dreamIf a woman sees Shooting a knife in a dream, this indicates the difficulties she faced after a breakup. Imam Al-Sadiq says: If a pregnant woman is vulnerable to being stabbed with infidelity, she can have a cesarean section, which is unnatural. Betrayal with a knife that appears in a lonely girl’s dream can testify to her betrayal or the painful words of her lover. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal at work in a dream: Betrayal by a man with a knife is one of the signs that indicates that this man will find it very difficult to make a living from his work. Betrayal that affects the dreamer in the work sector could be a warning sign for him that there are many colleagues who are trying to harm him. Betrayal at work indicates that the dreamer has faced a serious problem in his current job, and this problem may require a quick solution from the dreamer. title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole plums in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you the interpretation of seeing plums. Plum is a type of fruit that is known to belong to the peach family. Plums have excellent taste and beneficial properties that they are rich in. Seeing plums in a dream is one of the visions that some people can have in a dream. Therefore, we have provided you, dear followers, with everything related to the complete interpretation of yellow plums in a dream, as well as the interpretation of a dream about red and yellow plums, as well as the interpretation of a dream about red plums for women. The interpretation of the dream there are plums for a pregnant and married woman is from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Why do you dream of red and yellow plums? The interpretation of seeing a whole red plum in a dream is one of the visions that, according to some scholars, indicates achieving success in the dreamer’s life. A red plum in a dream indicates Success and fulfillment of desires in life, and the dreamer enters a period full of happiness and prosperity. Seeing a whole red plum in a dream for someone is news of her imminent marriage, as a woman in a whole dream also testifies to her imminent marriage. As for seeing a whole yellow plum in a dream, it is an undesirable dream, which It indicates that the dreamer will face some problems in the next life. Seeing yellow plums in a full dream indicates that this is a sign of sadness and suffering for the dreamer, because the yellow color is not popular in a full dream. See also: Why dream of seeing peaches in a dream full? Eating plums in a dream full With a general woman: Seeing an unmarried girl eating ripe plums in a dream is evidence of a close marriage with a person with a beautiful and gentle nature. Interpretation of a dream about eating peaches for a bowling woman is a sign of many happy changes in her life and evidence of prosperity in life. See also: Why dream of almonds in The dream is complete. Why does a married woman dream of peaches? Seeing plums in general in a married woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and benefit and the beginning of many favorable changes in her next life. Eating a whole plum in a dream for a married woman is good news and evidence that you are earning a living, earning A lot of money, and that your husband is able to get a good job. Also, there are plums in a dream for a married woman, which means that she will satisfy many desires, and if she does not give birth, this is evidence of the approaching pregnancy. See also: Why do apricots dream in a full dream? Why do you dream of plums? Black for a single woman. Some researchers in the interpretation of dreams and visions have reported that seeing a black plum in a dream is full of desired visions, which indicates the disappearance of worries and problems. Why do you dream of a yellow plum? We have found in the books of some interpretation researchers that the yellow color in general is a sign of sadness and anxiety and that the dreamer Enters a period of sadness.Why dream of eating red plums for an ordinary womanWhy does a lonely woman dream of red plums – a sign of fulfillment of her desires, achieving all goals and overcoming difficulties in the next life.Seeing red plums in the whole dream and eating it and its taste was wonderful – this is news

title: Interpretation of a screwdriver in a dream and loosening something in a dream

preview.html: Screwdriver in a dream A screwdriver in a dream is one of the very strange dreams that we see in our dreams, which carries for us a different number of important signs that the dreamer must know in the exact form, as the screwdriver is present in many different and strange forms in life. All of this may appear to us in the dream and we will explain You have the many meanings and consequences of seeing a screwdriver in a dream, as explained by the famous translator Ibn Shaheen in his interpretations. Interpretation of breaking something in a dream. Solving something in a dream. Unity between combining and untangling. The solution is the throat, which is stinging with constipation and miserliness, according to the Almighty’s saying: {Untangling the throat or feeding Day of need. Which the dreamer will get. Seeing a screwdriver in the house in a dream is evidence of the lawful money that the dreamer gets. As a screwdriver in a dream shows the disintegration of the family and the distance between spouses in life. A screwdriver in a dream also shows that the dreamer is very generous. Seeing the dreamer trying to unscrew a screw With a screwdriver, it means that he is trying to get rid of disputes and marital problems. A screwdriver in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is trying to help many people. Interpretation of a screwdriver in a single woman’s dream. An unmarried woman who sees a screwdriver being sold in a dream without knowing the price is evidence of her asceticism in life. Life.Seeing a girl in a dream using a screwdriver means that she will get a good position in life.A screwdriver in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the distinctive changes she is receiving.Interpretation of a screwdriver in a dream for a married woman.A screwdriver in a married woman’s dream is evidence of moving to a new home. In the near future. A screwdriver in a married woman’s dream also indicates kindness and happiness in her home. Seeing a screwdriver in a married woman’s dream indicates a good husband and the husband’s great love for her. A married woman carrying a screwdriver in a dream indicates the great responsibility she bears in life. General.Interpretation of a screwdriver in a pregnant woman’s dreamIf you see a screwdriver in a dream, this means that the delivery date is approaching in the near future.Interpretation of a screwdriver in a man’s dream. A man’s vision of a blue screwdriver in a dream is evidence of the presence of good friends in life. Seeing a yellow screwdriver in a dream indicates The joy and happiness that the dreamer will gain. A yellow screwdriver in a dream indicates an abundance of blessings and goodness.

title: Interpretation of seeing a piano in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a piano? It symbolizes insight that you are having a good time practicing a hobby. What is the purpose of watching sad music? An indication of bad news that the priest will hear soon. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman playing a piano in a dream? It symbolizes her meeting the right person with whom she will continue With him is her life. What is the purpose of seeing a married woman’s piano in her home? It indicates the stability of her marital and family life. Interpretation of seeing yourself playing the violin in a dream? One of the good and praiseworthy visions that symbolize a harmonious family life. What is the meaning of seeing a piano broken or broken? It indicates that the owner of the vision He is not satisfied with his situation. What is the interpretation of seeing a piano holder in her dream? Evidence that he lives a life of comfort and luxury. A piano in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a piano in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is spending an enjoyable time practicing a hobby or job that he loves. If one sees in a dream that Listening to a beautiful piano, this is a sign that the dreamer will achieve success and distinction in his life and enjoy health and well-being. However, if the dreamer hears bad dissonance playing in a dream, this indicates that he is facing some difficult circumstances and obstacles that he faces in his life. While pointing, see yourself listening to sad music In a dream, in the bad news that the priest will hear soon. Seeing a broken or broken piano indicates that the dreamer is dissatisfied with his situation. Then it also appears that the dreamer has gone through a situation of failure, either with his friends or his children. If one sees an old piano in his dream, this is a sign of He neglected the old advice that his parents had given him in the past. The vision serves as a warning not to do that again. Interpretation of seeing a piano in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a piano at home in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates joy and happiness. Then playing the piano in a single girl’s dream symbolizes meeting the right person who She will continue her life with him. But if an unmarried girl sees a broken piano in her dream, this is a sign that she has lost someone close to her. A broken piano in an unmarried girl’s dream can symbolize that someone close to her will betray her. Interpretation of seeing a piano in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a woman sees A pregnant woman sees a beautiful piano in her dream, then this is good news that she will give birth to a beautiful child, sound in mind and body, God willing. Then the piano in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes that she will live a life of comfort and luxury. If a pregnant woman sees a new white piano in her dream, this is a sign that she will give birth to an easy and smooth one, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a piano in a dream. They symbolize seeing buying a piano in a dream to the person with the vision who is making a big investment in his life and will be very successful. This investment could be cash, time, or effort in its place. It may happen that the divine will get a big promotion as a result of the great effort he put into it. His work. Or that he succeeds with distinction as a result of his diligence in studying, and so on until the end of the examples according to the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a white piano in a dreamIf one sees in a dream...

preview.html: Seeing cookies in a dream is one of the visions that carry many different meanings. It may have some commendable connotations and meanings, while others may have some bad connotations. Seeing cookies is an indication that the dreamer may leave some trivial matters that control him. Life, and the vision differs from one person to another according to his psychological, social and health condition, as the vision cannot be generalized to all people, and in the following encyclopedia article we present some different interpretations of seeing cookies in a dream. Seeing cookies in a dream If one sees cookies in a dream, this indicates high prices, and if the dreamer wants to buy some things, he may find them more expensive than expected. Seeing a dream that you are trying to reach a cookie, but you cannot, in this vision is an indication that there is someone who steals your fatigue and fatigue and tries to take the fruits of your work. And if you see a cookie in a dream and you can reach it, this dream shows that you can reach the things you want, and it also shows that you are one of the people who know the right path and walk on it and that you know very well how to get what you want and how to fulfill all your desires. The dream of baked and eaten cookies is a sign that the dreamer is one of those very loyal and loyal people. Also, seeing salted cookies in a dream means that you will take care of many complex problems and often you will not be able to solve these problems. If you see in your dream that you are giving some cookies to someone, this It means that you enjoy comfort, peace and reassurance in your life and that you are one of those people who avoid problems. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is baking biscuit dough himself, this dream is one of the visions that show hope and optimism in the dreamer's life. Ibn Sirin said that seeing someone in his dream carrying celebration cakes, this dream indicates the kind words and good memory of the dreamer during his absence. Seeing someone eating Eid cakes in a dream indicates love and tolerance and also indicates that the dreamer will achieve many successes in his life. Seeing a person of some people eating biscuits greedily in a dream indicates that these people need love and affection around them and must support them with affection. Seeing cookies in a woman's dream Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream eating biscuits, this vision is one of the good connections, as it indicates joy, happiness, connection and close marriage. A married woman sees in her dream that her husband has sweets and needs them but she prevents him. In a dream, it is an indication of the emotional distance between the spouses and the presence of differences and problems, or an indication of a change in some of the qualities and characteristics that the husband is accustomed to. Seeing a married woman in her dream kneading biscuits, preparing them, and adding chocolate to them, this is evidence of the happy married life between her and her husband and indicates the presence of
